title: Dunlending Madman (4C12)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	7

Game Text:	Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.
